Posts.Content: Hi all ... Yesterday my big toes both started hurting like someone had stood on them and today both nails are bruised and still sore ... Does anyone know if this is a side effect. I'm due to have 3rd session of FEC tomorrow ... Thanks in advance
Posts.Title: Bruised Toe Nails

Posts.Content: Thanks guys for your replies ... I'll stop worrying now .... Onwards & Upwards
Posts.Title: Bruised Toe Nails

Posts.Content: hi all,new to this site ,about to start chemo on Tuesday and feeling very anxious .do you feel sick straight away and has anyone had the cold cap and how did you feel .  Thank you Helen x
Posts.Title: Chemotherapy after double mastectomy

Posts.Content: Thank you all for your replies ... Had pic line fitted yesterday so ready now for Tuesday ... Onwards & upwards x
Posts.Title: Chemotherapy after double mastectomy

Posts.Content: Thanks Charlotte decided not to do cold cap but after first FEC-t today I feel so light headed it's like having a hangover  and yes going to keep a diary to record my experience thanks Helen x
Posts.Title: Chemotherapy after double mastectomy

Posts.Content: Hi G n J thanks so much was hoping it was a side effect it's driving me mad .. The nurse at hosp told me not to take the Domperidone unless I felt sick so thats why I haven't maybe I should it might help ... Thanks again xx
Posts.Title: Headaches after first FEC -t

Posts.Content: Hi all just asking for advice please. Had my first chemo on Tuesday just gone (FEC -t) and have had a headache since .. Tried Paracetamol after asking but it's not shifting it .. I'm drinking plenty of water and taking tabs prescribed but haven't had Domperidone as haven't been sick .... Any help greatly appreciated x Helen x
Posts.Title: Headaches after first FEC -t

Posts.Content: Thank you Katee 17 still got headache but seems to be getting a little better .... It's driven mad and it's nice to hear you didn't get anymore x
Posts.Title: Headaches after first FEC -t

Posts.Content: Hi ctrigg im new to site and had my first FEC today I'm feeling light headed and I feel like I have a hangover ... Do you get this at all  thanks Helen
Posts.Title: 3rd fec half way
